page.title: 05RELIGION - OWERSBY S.SCHOOL
page.content: There is a Sunday School at St.Martins Church, North Owersby, which meets twice monthly.About 15 children attend varying in age from 4-13 years. They take part in the special services such as Mothering Sunday, Harvest Festival and Christingle. Earlier this year they revived dancing round the Maypole as part of a fund-raising effort. New kneelers were made for the Church and Nativity Characters were modelled ready for Christmas. This year's annual outing was a visit to Lincoln Cathedral and the Castle. Plans are being made for a Christmas Party.
